Privacy Friendly Minesweeper is a minesweeper game that belongs to the group of privacy friendly apps.
Are there different game modes available?
Yes, you can choose between the game modes \'easy\', \'medium\', \'difficult\' and \'user-defined\'.

Every field has exactly as much mines under the 9 fields in its surrounding as the number on the field indicates. The number becomes visible when the field is uncovered by clicking on it. Logically combining the numbers on several uncovered fields enables you to identify fields that contain a mine.
What is the use of setting a flag on a field?

Marked fields can not be uncovered by accident. Moreover, if you click on an already uncovered field and the number of flags on the 9 surrounding fields equals its number, all 9 surrounding fields are uncovered.
What does the toolbar show while playing?
While playing, the toolbar displays the level of difficulty, the difference between marked fields and the number of mines and the time played so far.
Can I mark fields when I think there is a mine?
You can mark fields with a flag if you think that they contain a mine. You need to activate the marking mode to do so. You can remove flags by clicking on a marked field again.
Can I track the my performance?
You can track your performance and top times on the statistics page.
What is the difference between the levels of difficulty?

The higher the level of difficulty, the higher is the portion of mines on the playing field. Additionally, the number of fields on the playing field increases with the degree of difficulty. 
Easy: 6x10 fields, 7 mines 
Medium: 10x16 fields, 24 mines 
Difficult: 12x19 fields, 46 mines
What is the user defined game mode?
In the user defined game mode, you can freely choose the size of the playing field and the degree of difficulty.
Under the fields of the playing field are numbers and mines. The aim of the game is to uncover all fields of the playing field without triggering a mine.
Can I continue games I started earlier?
Yes. Games that are left using the Back-Button are saved and can be continued from the saved games menu, accessible over the Button \'Continue Game\' in the main menu. The last ten games are stored.
What happens if I uncover a field that contains a mine?
If you uncover a field that contains a mine, you lost.
Privacy Friendly Minesweeper does not require any permission. It does not include any tracking mechanisms or advertisement.
Which permissions does the app require?
Privacy Friendly Minesweeper does not require any permission.
